entry.summary: Free “Friendship bracelet” mint worth 1.2 ETH for anyone who has held min. 1 @artblocks_io piece before October 26 📸 To claim go to If you qualify you will see an option to mint 2 friendship bracelets. 24hrs left! http://artblocks.io

entry.title: 🚨 AIRDROP RUMOUR 🚨 Could be a good play to stake some $MATIC in @omnidotapp. Reasons 👇 1. You get a chance to win from a prize pool of $10,00...
entry.summary:
🚨 AIRDROP RUMOUR 🚨 Could be a good play to stake some $MATIC in @omnidotapp. Reasons 👇 1. You get a chance to win from a prize pool of $10,000 2. You earn $MATIC staking yield 3. Chance of an $OMNI token down the line 🪂
Omni: Omni is excited to launch our inaugural Staking Sweepstakes! Stake as you would, enter for a chance to win prize money 💸💸💸 Our first Sweepstakes will kick off with $MATIC staking and a total prize pool worth 10,000 USD 💰 You have until January 8th to enter. Here's how ⬇️
